verbose_text: To test this hypothesis, we generated mice heterozygous or homozygous for pancreas specific knockout of Bmpr1a (referred hereafter as pBmpr1aHet or pBmpr1aKO) in which the floxed Bmpr1a sequence was deleted by the expression of Cre transgene under the control of the promoter for Pdx1 (the pancreas and duodenum transcription factor 1, also in humans called IPF1 or IDX1) gene.
